page.title: 14IFTON HEATH C.P. SCHOOL
page.content: There is a{headmaster,secretary}and {eight teachers.}There are{205 children altogether.There is{one cook}and{three {assistants. Dinner}costs{60p.}We sometimes have{curry}and{rice}or{ {salad. }At dinner time,{four ladies} come to supervise us while we are eating and playing.{Two people}clean our school every night. In school we{play}all different kinds of{games.}There is{Pac.man.}It's a bit like{tig.}One person is on and she has to chase the others around the lines on the playground.The circle in the middle is den.You are safe if you can reach den.I like{hide and seek. I sometimes hide behind the bicycle shed.We play{skipping.}Two people hold each end of the rope and swing it while the others jump in.The boys like to play{football.}In the winter, the girls play{netball.
